ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK( Website )), LOWER(LEFT(Website,4)) <> "www.", LOWER(LEFT(Website,12)) <> "https://www." ),
AND( ISCHANGED( Website ), NOT(ISBLANK( Website)), LOWER(LEFT(Website,4)) <> "www.", LOWER(LEFT(Website,12)) <> "https://www." ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Website URL
